item.description:
MAVI offers the finest Mediterranean cuisine inspired by French, Italian, Turkish, Greek and Albanian cuisine. Authentic yet affordable dishes featuring local, organic produce.

Rated one of the best restaurants in Connecticut and one of the top Mediterranean restaurants in the country, MAVI offers a unique experience and transports you to the region which has shaped the world's culinary heritage.

Join me and 10 members of my Meetup Group (Adventures in Travel, Sports & Dining) in our own private room & bar upstairs which we'll have all to ourselves!

5:30 - 6:30 Cocktail hour with $6.00 drink specials

6:30 - 8:30 Dinner

Please Note:

* Please bring cash to make it easier to divide up the bill

* If you can't arrive right at 5:30 don't worry, just arrive by 6:30 so we can all place our dinner orders at the same time.

* $1.00 Meetup Donation applies to this event




~ SAMPLE MENU ~
(The actual menu is MUCH more extensive!)



APPETIZERS


Mediterranean Mezé 5.
Classic assortment of seasonal vegetables.

Golden Fried Calamari 7.
Fumé blanc, capers, lemon-Dijon aioli.

Istanbul Grilled Kebabs 5.
Freshly ground organic chicken or lamb.


SALADS


House 5.
Field greens, variety of garden vegetables.

Spinach 7.
Organic baby spinach, shaved Manchego, almonds.

Arugula 7.
Organic Arugula, warm breaded Artisan goat cheese, cranberries.

ENTREES
(includes choice of 2 sides)


Seafood Mixed Grill 22.
Assortment of five fresh daily selections.

Grilled Whole Mediteranian Sea Bass 22.

Grilled Atlantic Salmon 16.

Aged Angus Sirloin Steak 25.

Rack of Lamb (half 18. – whole -24.)
Rosemary and garlic rub.

Doner 14.
Spit roasted thin cuts of tender veal and lamb, yogurt sauce.

Stella Gorgonzola Chicken 14.
Organic chicken, gorgonzola, pesto.

Mixed Grill 18.
Grilled organic chicken, lamb and beef, yogurt sauce

Duck L’Orange 19.
Roasted wild duck, sauce L’Orange

Veal Medallions 18.
Parmesan and organic herb crusted, beurre blánc.

Shish Kebab 15.
Choice of organic chicken

Tuscan Spaghetti with Crab 16.
Maryland crab, tomato and red wine sauce.

Pizza 10.
Thin Crust, buffalo mozzarella, tomato sauce
Add vegetables or grilled chicken 3.

SIDES
(Choice of 2)



Organic Asparagus Sautéed Carrots French Beans
Butternut Squash, Orange Glazed Apricots & Pistachios Lima Beans Sautéed Peas & Shallots Steamed Broccoli Sautéed Mushrooms & Leeks
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be upstairs in the private room (Ask for Sheri's Meetup Group)
item.name: Dinner at Mavi (10/6/09)
